EmailTemplate.name: 18JulyWeb-Trends.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: 5 market trends consultants need to know: July Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us on July 18 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "The 5 Market Trends Independent Consultants Need to Know in 2013 <http://info.mbopartners.com/18JulyWebTrends_RegistrationPage.html>."
Independent consultants are multitaskers by necessity, so it's normal to get so busy that you fall behind on the important trends surrounding the marketplace you work in.
To bring you up to speed, MBO Partners will welcome an expert in market trend analysis - Dorothy Price Hill, Senior Managing Director of Mid-Market Securities. Dorothy will discuss the 5 trends in today's market that you need to know to keep your consultancy relevant, why they are important and how you can leverage them to gain knowledge and/or skills to set yourself apart from your competitors. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/18JulyWebTrends_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: webinar@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
